Texts.Chs: <译文: 耶特是我们烘焙食品中最美味的，在与维洛林人的贸易谈判中被证明是最有益的。他们的文化似乎把烘焙视为一种神圣的职业。领导层已经决定，这将影响未来与他们的所有贸易。>
Texts.Eng: <Translation: Yettas, the most delicious of our baked goods, has proven most beneficial in trade negotiations with the Velorin people. It seems that their culture reveres baking as a sacred profession. Leadership has decided this will influence all future trade with them.>
